name: Evan Atkins
text: Absolutely disrespectful. Took way to long. Rude employees

name: September Young
text: Love this place good food and service.

name: Joel Simon
text: Ordered pasta over the phone. On the menu it says "Accompanied by breadsticks." When picking up the food no breadsticks were given because "I did not indicate over the phone that I wanted them." Asst. manager with earbuds in would not give them to us. Won't be back.

name: J Brown
text: Ordered a dinner box with two one-topping pizzas. Asked if they would make one just cheese and put that topping on the other one. Nope, can't do it, even tho the pizzas are in the same box. Dumb. Won't be back.

name: Some1s Mum
text: Love my garlic knots. Great employees

name: Janice Cramer
text: Workers are very friendly and the food is always hot and fresh

name: Daniel Burkhart
text: Love to order carryout at this location. The gentleman cashier was extremely helpful and friendly! Great customer service! My wife and I love to order from here. Wish we had one in mcconnellsburg!

name: James Price
text: I love the Buffalo chicken pizza from there with the banana peppers. They usually are quick unless they are really busy. The people are friendly. Plus it Is not to far away. I'm sure they are not all the same quality but got to be pretty close.

name: Darryll x_H
text: There was very limited space in the "dining room," which was no more than a few tables with chairs in a small foyer. There were no condiments on the table. Pizza Hut is to pizza what McDonalds is to hamburgers - gross. This is certainly not ‚Ä¶More

name: Raymond Bailey
text: I really like my pizza and Pizza Hut serves something I can modify to taste. Usual chain vibe and seating environment is cold and utilitarian. Servers vary (of course) but given the half-take out half-dine in atmosphere you get what you ask ‚Ä¶More

name: Bently Gabel
text: Last couple time I‚Äôve gone my order was not what I wanted. Also called to complain and they hung up on me. Not happy at all.

text: Terry! Great customer service !

text: We have  gotten  pizza from this location for years and now the last two time we've  ordered we have noticed the crust of the pan pizza is not greasy/golden crispy like it use to be.Recipe was changed,will not be getting from there anymoreüò£üò£üò£üò£üò£üò£ PLEASE CHANGE BACK

text: Ordered a pepperoni lovers pizza for carry out, when I picked the pizza up it had no pepperonis on it. When I spoke with the manager about this she argued with me that I ordered a pepperoni lover's pizza with no pepperoni; When I asked her ‚Ä¶More

name: L. S.
text: The greatest tasting pizza you will ever eat! It's good for hangin' with friends. Totally recommend.

text: I really enjoy this pizza hut. They have great service..the staff has always been friendly and service is fast.

name: Jennifer T
text: Pizza was poorly made, and order was taken incorrectly. Only one was supposed to be pan. The other two were supposed to be hand tossed. The toasted parmesan was supposed to be on the two hand tossed that we didn't get, and the hut favorite ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy Higgins
text: Always good and nice employees and has good deals all the time just wish they would deliver a little farther.

name: Matt Pecha
text: Called them and the recording said an order taker would be right with me. Come to find out after over 4 minutes on hold that they were closed for thanksgiving. Its understandable amd perfectly acceptable to be closed on this day however ‚Ä¶More

text: It's a pizza hut so expect that quality of food, otherwise, very quick service and nice people.

text: The delivery driver was an ass tore up the driveway an yelled at me in front of my kids because he thought his tip wasn't good enough.

text: Be sure to look for feathers with your wings. Called to let them know and her (supposed to have been the store manager) response was, well we don't have time to look for feathers, we buy them frozen and just dump them in a fryer.
